Articles.Content:
Sorry about the potato quality, my laptop is getting a bit old and tired. Will upload more later, but I finally installed the last array (I know, out of order), and I wanted to share a first glimpse.

The whole idea was build an ISS that is accurate and fits (and can be lifted by) the appropriate launch vehicles, and can be assembled in orbit by a newer player. I wanted to test the Solar arrays first because they're a pain in the behind.

Looking neat! I like how you did the solar panels. I'm always scratching my head trying to duplicate the HUGE panels on the ISS.

I wish that KSP actually needed them. Most of the time you can run huge stations off of just one Gigantor
